pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, December 13, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould, will virtually join Premier of New Brunswick Blaine Higgs and New Brunswick Minister of Education and Early Childhood Development Dominic Cardy in Fredericton, New Brunswick, to make an early learning and child care announcement. Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, Infrastructure and Communities Dominic LeBlanc and Minister of Official Languages and Minister responsible for the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Ginette Petitpas Taylor will also virtually join from Moncton, New Brunswick. A media availability will follow.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event from the National Press Theatre must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can also dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 1-866-206-0153
    Toll-free: 613-954-9003
    Pass code: 5522508#
